000100020808**
000200020808                  SPRAYER INPUT GUIDLINES
000300020808
0004000208091. Sections 1 thru 5 have 12 poles on each side, 24 total.
000500020809   sections 6 thru 10 have 14 poles on each side, 28 total.
000600020809
0007000208092. Bays are scanned from pole 1 left thru pole 12/14 left then pole
000800020809   12/14 right thru pole 1 right.
000900020808
0010000208093. There are 55 trays at a pole.
001100020808
0012000208094. All new pole entry start at left side of pole area when facing pole.
001300020809   (If continued from previous pole entry can start anywhere.)
001400020808
0015000208095. If poles are entered the system will use only full poles, starting
001600020808   with the current pole. If current pole has 35 flats previously used
001700020809   and you enter 1 pole the system will only use the remaining 20 flats
001800020809   from this pole and 55 flats for all remaining poles.
001900020808
0020000208096. Use 100 trays per gallon and round up to next highest gallon.
002100020822   (Minimum 1 galllon.)
002200020808
0023000208227. Boss sprayer holds 150 gallons min. 6 poles.  Bean sprayers hold
002400020822   up to 14 gallons. 1 galon is the minimum amount we can make in any
002500020822   sprayer.
002600020808
002700020808
002800020808
002900020808
003000020808
003100020808
003200020808
003300020808
003400020808
003500020808
003600020808
003700020808
003800020808
003900020808
004000020808
004100020808
004200020808
004300020808

004500020808
004600020808
004700020808
004800020808
004900020808
005000020808
005100020808
005200020808
005300020808
005400020808
005500020808
005600020808
005700020808
005800020808
005900020808
006000020808
006100020808
006200020808
006300020808
006400020808
006500020808
